title: Kalista's Ult with Locked Camera
body:
I have been trying out Kalista lately. When I play with friends that are supporting me, they have often complained about one thing. 

When Kalista uses her ultimate the game locks the camera of the support player. This can be very disorienting, even when the ult is called beforehand. Oftentimes they are seeing the environment move quickly around them as their character model rushes towards mine. If the camera needs to be locked at all, I think it would make a lot more sense for the camera to be locked in Kalista's view. This would allow the support player ample time to see which targets are around Kalista and make the correct decision on which to knock up instead of the blur that they currently experience.

 How do others feel about Kalista's ult and the camera being locked? I would really like to hear the opinions of support mains that have played with Kalista. Would you prefer for the camera to be locked in her view or do you like how the camera currently locks on you? I feel like unlocking the camera entirely would be far superior to these options, but that may be a balancing issue, similar to Sion's ultimate.

replies.body: I personally always have the Camera locked. But that's just me, I guess. It doesn't disorient me when my sweetheart gently picks me up and tosses me into the pit of harmless bunnies for me *to mercilessly slaughter and bathe in their blood.*
Yes please!(locked on Kalista or no auto-lock at all, either is better than it is now)
It should be focused around Kalista, not lock it around you, Prob why half the times my friend ulted they failed
Just close your eyes and land the skillshot {{champion:64}} style
No locked camera, please. I wanna maneuver it myself.

I main support and my friend mains ADC, we both duo all the time and he plays a lot of kalista. I am not really the salty/complaining type, but when i am ulted by a kalista with a locked screen, the screen gets all glitched or laggy i dont know how to explain it. It goes back and forth very very very fast and i tend to miscalulate my dash-knock-up thing.

She needs a way to decline that soulbound mechanic.

The locked camera is annoying as fuck too, but I should at least have a way to say no first
I cancelled locked camera after using Fiora's ULT.
I hate camera lock, I wouldn't mind a camera jump to Kalista, in fact that'd be great, but screw the camera locking.
i dont have an issue with it. since you're not going to be looking at anything besides where you're ulting Lol.
